title: Collaborative Language Learning: Short-Intensive Courses Utilizing SDGs

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental language proficiency and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: Course where learners composed of in-service practitioners improve language skills using collaboration tools, emphasizing real-world application competencies through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively use SDG (Sustainable Development Goals) frameworks to apply over 10 job-related vocabulary terms contextually.
Learners can analyze complex grammatical structures through group discussions and deliver oral presentations with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can improve pronunciation accuracy by over 25% based on peer feedback and demonstrate it with recorded materials.
Learners can complete role-play scenarios using SDGs (Sustainable Development Goals) and achieve 90% situational listening comprehension.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
